title: Analysts claim accumulating these 2 coins is like buying Ethereum at $3
description: Crypto analysts are giving positive claims, suggesting that buying Ripple (XRP) at $2.47 or Mutuum Finance (MUTM) at $0.02 today could be like scooping up Ethereum (ETH) at $3 before its legendary rise to over $4,800.  When XRP’s SEC battle is finally over, its real-world adoption in global payments is set to accelerate. title: HC Wainwright Predicts Increased Earnings for Bitcoin Depot
description: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM – Free Report) – HC Wainwright upped their Q1 2025 earnings per share estimates for shares of Bitcoin Depot in a research report issued to clients and investors on Tuesday, March 18th. title: Promising Bitcoin Stocks To Consider – March 20th
description: iShares Bitcoin Trust, MARA, and CleanSpark are the three Bitcoin stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool.
